Procedure.string: Combine lamb, coriander, cumin, garam masala. Mix in the yogurt and season with salt. Let marinate for one hour
Put chillies in small saucepan over high heat with enough water to just cover them. Bring to a boil then simmer for 6-7 minutes until chilles are soft. Remove from heat and set aside
Heat half the oil in a frying pan on high heat. Add coriander seeds and fry for about 30 seconds before adding in onions. Once onions are translucent, add in garlic and cook for a bit longer.
Put the above mixture into a blender along with the soft chillies and their cooking liquid. Add water to just cover the mixture and blitz into a puree

Heat the remaining oil in a pan over high heat and add the marinated lamb. Fry for a few minutes and add the onion and chilli puree. Season to taste and cook over medium heat for 50 minutes until meat is tender. Can also add water during cooking process if the curry dries out.
